meanings.definition: The quality or state of being spicy.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy the spicinesses of the curry.
meanings.sent2: The spicinesses of the salsa made my mouth tingle.
meanings.sent3: The spicinesses of the chili pepper caught me by surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her cooking always has a touch of spicinesses that sets it apart.
meanings.sent5: The spicinesses of the hot sauce lingered on my taste buds.

meanings.definition: The degree of pungency or heat in a food or drink.
meanings.sent1: The spicinesses of the jalapeno were too much for me.
meanings.sent2: I could handle a little spicinesses in my noodles.
meanings.sent3: The spicinesses of the salsa gave me a spicy surprise.
meanings.sent4: The spicinesses of the curry hit the back of my throat.
meanings.sent5: The spicinesses of the hot wings left me reaching for water.
